img_summary: The image depicts an in-game item from *Black Myth: Wukong*, likely an ingredient used for crafting or other gameplay purposes. Based on the surrounding context, it appears to be part of a list of collectible ingredients, similar to Monkey-Head Fungus, Fire Bellflower, Tree Pearl, and Golden Lotus, each with rarity and location details. The item shown is consistent with the game's focus on gathering resources from specific areas or enemies.
